ing: 1 (3 ounce) package any flavor ramen noodles
des: "This is an extremely simple and delicious spin on the typical ramen noodles that can be EASILY made in the college environment!"
ins: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan. Add ramen noodles and cook 2 minutes until tender. Pour out water, then stir in seasoning packet and cheese to serve.
